Description.0: Class Test: An online quiz including multiple choice, multi-select, true or false, short answer, matched items questions will be undertaken in mid semester.
Description.1: Assignment: A final short assignment will be submitted by students individually at the end of semester.
Description.2: Group Project: There will be two group project assignments during the course of the module. The first will be a formative assessment and the second summative.
Description.3: Group Project: 1 of 2 group projects described
